Prerequisite: Pact of the Chain feature
When you cast find familiar, you infuse the summoned familiar with a measure of your eldritch power, granting the creature the following benefits:

  • Your familiar can see through magical darkness.
  • As a bonus action, you can command the familiar to take the Attack action.
  • If the familiar forces a creature to make a saving throw, it can use your spell save DC.
  • While your familiar is within 30 feet of you and you are conscious, it has resistance to all damage.
  • As an action familiar can share it's Magic Resistance trait to another creature other than you of your choice that is within 10 feet of it. This lasts until your familiar is more than 10 feet away from the creature, it completes a short or long rest or until you use this feature again.
